snippet: BERROCAL TORRES--Ida Inez, on June 5, 2016. Loving mother of Diego J. (Joyce) and the late Antoinette Nagle. Beloved grandmother of Diego F. and Joaquin. Cherished sister of Josephine and the late Victor, Carmen, Lydia and Sylvia. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Family will receive friends at Frank E. Campbell--The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Ave., Wednesday and Thursday 2-4 and 7-9pm. Funeral mass Friday 10:30am, St. Patrick's Cathedral, East 51st Street and 5th Ave. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERROCAL TORRES, IDA INEZ
